control_attributes.control_description: The information system protects the [Selection (one or more): confidentiality; integrity] of transmitted information.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system at managed interfaces denies network communications traffic by default and allows network communications traffic by exception (i.e., deny all, permit by exception).

Control Statement: The information system protects the [Selection (one or more): confidentiality; integrity] of transmitted information.
